sourcesContent:
Order Summary

Shipping Value Will be addedd on Total Price

  • Order SubTotal {{(basketTotals$ |async).subtotal |currency}}
  • Shipping {{(basketTotals$ |async).shipping |currency}}
  • Total {{(basketTotals$ |async).total |currency}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { BasketService } from 'src/app/basket/basket.service'; import { IBasketTotals } from '../../Models/basket'; @Component({ selector: 'app-order-totals', templateUrl: './order-totals.component.html', styleUrls: ['./order-totals.component.scss'] }) export class OrderTotalsComponent implements OnInit { basketTotals$ : Observable; constructor(private basketService:BasketService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.basketTotals$ = this.basketService.basketTotal$; } }
